headline: BNY to Speak at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation ("BNY") (NYSE: BK), a global financial services company, today announced that Dermot McDonogh, Chief Financial Officer, will speak at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference in New York at 2:45 p.m. ET on Tuesday, September 9, 2025. The discussion may include forward-looking statements and other material information.
